title: The Trendzeitapest Hotel 3/10: MLB, Mario Day, Madison Cawthorn, 2020 Census, Batman, Mike Pence
itunes:title: The Trendzeitapest Hotel 3/10: MLB, Mario Day, Madison Cawthorn, 2020 Census, Batman, Mike Pence
description:
In this edition of The Trendzeitapest Hotel, Jack and Miles discuss the return of baseball, Mario Day 2022, Madison Cawthorn calling Zelensky a 'thug', the 2020 Census undercounting people of color, Esquire's "Every Batman Movie Ranked" article, and Mike Pence eyeing a 2024 run.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
